channel.title: How to add Dicing to Hybrid Pking
channel.description: I'm having trouble Adding Dicing to my Hybrid Pking server. I know the Dicebag 0-100 Code but i dont know how to add it in, Anyway wanna Help? :]

item.title: How to add Dicing to Hybrid Pking
item.dc:creator: @sprirt_rock sprirt rock
item.source: How to add Dicing to Hybrid Pking

item.title: How to add Dicing to Hybrid Pking
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

[quote=“blo0d pker, post:257, topic:256172”][shadow=purple,left]DICING[PI][/shadow]
Difficulty: very simple
Classes modified: client, commands.

First off, open client class and find this:

directly above that, put this:

public void dicing() { int randomDice = Misc.random(100); forcedText = "[DICE]: I have rolled a "+randomDice+".["+playerName+"]"; forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; }
Now open commands and and underneath:

add this:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("dice")) { c.dicing(); }
You can edit it to work with clan chats if you want, I just thought some people like to dice in RS so why not give them something they can use to dice in a private server with :S[/quote]

Found in the snippets section… This is for PI.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add Dicing to Hybrid Pking
